Pokedex Number.description: The entry number of the Pokemon in the National Pokedex

Name.description: The English name of the Pokemon

Classification.description: The Classification of the Pokemon as described by the Sun and Moon Pokedex

Primary Type.description: The Primary Type of the Pokemon

Secondary Type.description: The Secondary Type of the Pokemon (e.g., poison)

Generation.description: The numbered generation in which the Pokemon was first introduced

Is Legendary.description: Denotes if the Pokemon is legendary. 0=not, 1=yes

Height_m.description: Height of the Pokemon in meters

Weight_kg.description: The Weight of the Pokemon in kilograms

HP.description: The Base HP of the Pokemon

Speed.description: The Base Speed of the Pokemon

Attack.description: The Base Attack of the Pokemon

Special Attack.description: The Base Special Attack of the Pokemon

Defense.description: The Base Defense of the Pokemon

Special Defense.description: The Base Special Defense of the Pokemon
